data.title: Oh my heavens!
data.text: Their cupcakes are delectable! I particularly enjoyed the carrot cake and the hummingbird cake; so moist and delicious icing. The macaron I had was good as well. I cannot wait to go back!

data.title: REALLY GOOD CUPCAKES
data.text: It is a place for adults and kids.  These cupcakes are good, I had a peanut butter cupcake and it was just right,  A friend and my daughter had the Oreo cupcake and a mini cheesecake and they were good.  It is probably a safe bet that any of their flavors are going to be good.  The ice cream was also good.  The place is also bigger than I thought and would be good for a meetup.  The location is also open fairly later than some of the other places downtown.

data.title: Cheesecakes and art
data.text: The bite sized cheesecakes are incredible! My girlfriend and I went in thinking we would just take one cheesecake to go and eat it as we explored dowtown Fayetteville, not even ten minutes later we turned around to stock up! They are that delicious!! Highly recommend The Sweet Palette if you are craving something sweet!

data.title: Best Service
data.text: This is my go to place for desserts for a party. The bite size cheesecakes are DELICIOUS and their cake balls are always a huge success at my events. They go above and beyond when creating cakes, cupcakes and cake balls for events that are theme related and provide the best service when you go in to see them.

data.title: Nice place to sit, snack, and watch the sidewalk traffic.
data.text: Father and son walk through town was highlight by fancy cupcakes and drinks, while people watching folks passing by. Great products and service. We will be regulars.

data.title: For the Sweet Tooth
data.text:
I love desserts but I can hardly ever finish a single serving as most places give you heaps. This was a pleasant surprise, especially with the mini cheesecakes.

I was in town for a few days and I went to check out the Airborne Museum, and then aftwards I visited downtown Fayetteville for a quick stroll to see what's up. I first went to Rude Awakening for coffee because it was suggested by my friend. After that, me and my partner walked down the street and we ended up at Sweet Palette. 

We ordered the German Chocolate and Salty Caramel cheesecakes, and what can I say, they were just delectable and the right size to share with each other. I would have ordered a couple more different flavours, but we had dinner reservations after. The lady behind the counter was very friendly and informed us that her sister made the desserts. The other half of the bakery/cafe is a gallery. There is a comfortable couch in the cafe area, and that's where we sat.

Only giving 4 stars because I didn't have their coffee.

data.title: Nice
data.text: I went to this bakery / coffee shop after eating at Taste of Africa a few doors from this location looking for coffee. I was pleased with the coffee but more satisfying were the small portion deserts. I was that that business is also used as a local art exhibit. While drinking coffee I walked around looking at the artwork. This business would be a great place to meet friends , first date , or a business meeting

data.title: A nice place for coffee and cupcakes
data.text: It has an artsy feel to it. Lots of space between tables. I went there on a Fourth Friday, which is a special day in Fayetteville - more festivities cooking downtown. They had a violinist who also sang Bossa Nova songs. It's in a good location, close to other shops and restaurants. The quality of the coffee and cupcakes was acceptable. Go there for artsy ambiance.

data.title: Tasty cupcakes and cheesecake bites
data.text:
I contacted The Sweet Palette in July for a last minute, large, custom cupcake order for my employer (after a friend recommended them!). They were very gracious about getting the order out with just under 24 hour notice. It made it even better knowing we were supporting a local business! 

Fast forward to this week when I stopped in to try some other cupcake flavors. I got the red velvet and the peanut butter; both were delicious! I also picked up 2 cheesecake bites (andes mint and german chocolate) to try; both were wonderful.

data.title: Tasty and imaginative hand-made desserts
data.text: Found this lovely little shop as we were strolling along the street in old-town Fayetteville. We had just eaten dinner and weren't hungry, but there were so many amazing choices of attractive mini-cheesecakes, cupcakes, cake balls, and ice cream that we simply had to get something! We chose an assortment of cheesecake bites to eat at home later; they all were delicious and not too heavy. The decor was simple and inviting, and the proprietress warm and personable.

data.title: Best cupcakes in a Fayetteville
data.text: Until I discovered this place today, I really enjoyed cupcakes at sweet tooth bakery. I tried the key lime cupcake and it blew me away of how light the cake was and the perfect sweetness and flavoring to the decadent icing. A super cool guy named Adam was working and was extremely friendly and gave us outstanding customer service. Also like how they cater to local artists by displaying pieces for sale and holding art shows at their location. It is my new go to cupcake place.

data.title: Delicious!
data.text: The store is fabulous to go in but there was not much for treats. There was a small selection of cupcakes 2.75 each and micro min cupcakes 2.50 that looked dry but tasted good. The cupcakes were very pretty tasted good but the frosting had a slight waxy feeling on the roof of my mouth.  I was surprised they had DAIRY-FREE cupcakes. They were delicious and I felt they were there on accident because someone wanted a Dairy-Free cake and these were left overs.  We bought 12 cupcakes and 6 Micro mini cheesecakes and spent 40 plus dollars. A little pricy but they were good.

data.title: Loved the signage... really drew us in!
data.text: While I would not waste your time or money on the cake pop creations (cake balls or bites, etc), the cupcakes were delish!  The shop is large and clean with adequate seating if you want to take a break.  We shared a turtle flavored cupcake and it was really good! Reasonably priced and very pleasant waitstaff!

data.title: Amazing cupcake!
data.text: I got the red velvet and took it home. I wanted another one and I'm not a big sweet eater. Not your usual cupcake shop. Great art on the wall, places to sit and talk with friends. I'm going back
